Affiliate Marketing remains the greatest opportunity for so many people

But it will become a curse if you start with a Ponzi mindset,

where you want to cash out without focusing on acquiring the required skills of marketing.

Chidinma note this ðŸ“Œ
Affiliate Marketing is not a get rich quick business

But it can get you rich

STOP rushing here and there, jumping from one business to another,

Calm down and LEARN the basics of marketing.

This Affiliate made $150 in 48 hours of starting Affiliate Marketing

Yes that's cool

Super cool

BUT

That doesn't mean you can do same

Don't rush into Affiliate Marketing just because someone made an amount in 2 hours

Be ready to learn & implement

Yours can take time!

GM

ðŸ’š Most Affiliate Marketers fail because they

- Focus on selling courses
- Don't use their marketing skills to sell other things
- Don't even understand what Affiliate Marketing is

But how can one have a business and not understand what the business is?
